name: AzureParallelDeploy
description: Minimize service deploy time by deploying multiple services to Azure Portal in parallel.
author: Stano Pe≈•ko

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an Azure resource manager subscription for the deployment.

inputs.name: ResourceGroup
inputs.label: Resource group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Resource group name in Azure Portal.

inputs.name: AppType
inputs.label: Application type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of applications to deploy. All deployed applications must be of the same type. If the value is not set, Web application ('WebApp') is used.

inputs.name: Services
inputs.label: Services
inputs.helpMarkDown: Logical names of the services to deploy, one name per line.

inputs.name: AppNameFormat
inputs.label: Azure application name format string
inputs.helpMarkDown: Format string for app service name in Azure Portal. Format string accepts one parameter `{0}`, which will be replace by the logical name of the service. For example if format string is `prod-{0}-api` and logical service name is `forecast`, the application will be deployed to `prod-forecast-api` app service. If the value is not set, "{0}" format string will be used.

inputs.name: AppSourceFormat
inputs.label: Application source file format string
inputs.helpMarkDown: Format string for path to source ZIP files for services. Every service is deployed from ZIP file. The format string accepts one parameter `{0}`, which will be replace by the logical name of the service. For example if this format string is `{0}-api.zip` and logical service name is `forecast`, source file path will be `forecast-api.zip`. "zip" extension must be specified expplicitly. If the value is not set, "{0}.zip" format string will be used.

inputs.name: AppSourceBasePath
inputs.label: Application source base path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Base path for services' source files. If not set, agent's default working directory is used (predefined variable `System.DefaultWorkingDirectory`). Services are deployed from ZIP files searched recursively under this directory.

inputs.name: SlotName
inputs.label: Slot name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the slot for deployment. The slot name is used for all deployed services.
